registryEntry.name: /OpenPages/Applications/GRCM/Special Object Fields/KeyRiskIndicator Assignee Field
registryEntry.description: The field name that identifies the KeyRiskIndicator Assignee field.

registryEntry.name: /OpenPages/Applications/GRCM/Locked Objects/Allowed Associations/KeyRiskIndicator
registryEntry.description: Allowed object type associations with locked parent object types.Each value here should be a comma-separated list of type names.

registryEntry.name: /OpenPages/Applications/GRCM/Locked Objects/Lock Child Types/KeyRiskIndicator
registryEntry.description: The child object types to be locked when parent is locked.Each value here should be a comma-separated list of type names

registryEntry.name: /OpenPages/Applications/GRCM/Signature/Cascade/KeyRiskIndicator
registryEntry.description: When the various IC Document types are signed off, child objects of the given types can also be signed automatically. Each value here should be a comma-separated list of type names.

registryEntry.name: /OpenPages/Applications/GRCM/Signature/Permission/KeyRiskIndicator
registryEntry.description: Comma-separated lists of user groups allowed to manually 'signoff' the Object type. If no group is listed, then object cannot be manually signed-off.

registryEntry.name: /OpenPages/Applications/GRCM/Home Page/myKeyRiskIndicator/ObjectTypeName
registryEntry.description: The name of the object type for the listing.

registryEntry.name: /OpenPages/Applications/GRCM/Auto Naming/KeyRiskIndicator/Auto-Named/Copied Object
registryEntry.description: Controls if copied instances of the Object are automatically named.Permissible values are true|false.

registryEntry.name: /OpenPages/Applications/GRCM/Auto Naming/KeyRiskIndicator/Auto-Named/New Object
registryEntry.description: Controls if new instances of the Object are automatically named. Permissible values are true|false.

registryEntry.name: /OpenPages/Applications/GRCM/Auto Naming/KeyRiskIndicator/Can be Edited
registryEntry.description: Controls if the Object name can be edited. Permissible values are true|false.

registryEntry.name: /OpenPages/Applications/GRCM/Auto Naming/KeyRiskIndicator/Default Parent Name
registryEntry.description: The string to use for the parent name if the Object does not have a parent.

registryEntry.name: /OpenPages/Applications/GRCM/Auto Naming/KeyRiskIndicator/Format
registryEntry.description: The auto-naming format.
